y_flags: Three or more watery stools a day and symptoms lasting more than two days
y_means: You could have a HAI or C. diff.
r_means: You need to be evaluated by a health care professional immediately.

r_flags: Severe abdominal cramping, pain, or a swollen abdomen

g_flags: Regularly wash your hands often with soap and water
y_flags: Mild to moderate abdominal pain or cramping and abdominal tenderness

r_flags: Blood or pus in your stool
